name: Wave Strike

sections.name: Prerequisites
sections.description: Weapon expertise class feature or Quick Draw, Bluff 1 rank.

sections.body: If on your first turn of combat you draw a melee weapon to attack an opponent within your reach, you can spend a swift action to make a Bluff check to feint against that opponent.
sections.name: Benefits

description: You present a serene facade until you unsheathe your weapon and strike in one fluid motion.
